pages.text: The Intraction Grid is a special block for automation using maids. It is meant to be placed next to blocks with inventories, such as chests. $(br2)It can also be placed next to a crafting table for auto-crafting.

Rightclicking grid with items will mark that item on the grid. A grid can be marked with 9 items maximum. To clear a mark, rightclick the mark with empty hand. $(br2)Rightclicking the four corner of the grid will toggle grid between input and output modes; while rightclicking the four edges of grid will toggle grid between whitelist and blacklist mode.
If the grid is placed next to a block with inventory, maids will automatically move items in/out based on the grid settings.

If the grid is placed next to a crafting table, maids will instead automatically craft items based on the recipe formed by markers on the grid. Input/output and white/blacklist settings are ignored in this case. $(br2)Grid settings are kept if broken. To reset the grid, right-clicking grid with empty hand while sneaking.
